headline: ‘It’s Harder to Fight When You’re Naked’
abstract: Charli Penn and Gibran Watkins have learned that love means giving each other space to be vulnerable and to heal.
lead_paragraph: Because marriage is an ever-evolving experience, we constantly shift, change and, in some cases, start over. In It’s No Secret, couples share thoughts about commitment and tell us what they have learned along the way, revealing their secret to making it work. (Answers are edited for context and space.)
